sections.title: Overview
content: We collaborated with a Taiwanese adult video company: "Model Media", and delivered the game as their first step towards the game industry.
The communication between two companies from different industries was a great experience to learn from a different perspective.

features.name: Story tree
features.description: The main story follows a tree structure to progress.

features.name: Massive video processing streamline
features.description: The game includes a huge amount of videos to process from our partner.

sections.title: Development Process
content: Despite several major design changes, I spent considerable time communicating with our partner's executive for feasible solutions.

The project was developed before Gen AI came out. I designed and developed several tools from scratch to fulfill the need to process the significant amount of video assets from our partner. Also for debugging purposes.

challenges.title: Challenge 1: WindowsVideoMedia errors in some computers
challenges.problem: We encountered some problems that some Windows computers were having trouble playing H264 videos.
challenges.solution: Re-processed the videos with specific color space information.

challenges.title: Challenge 2: Problems with some AMD graphic cards
challenges.problem: Some AMD computers were facing some trouble playing the game.
challenges.solution: Switched the project's rendering pipeline to Vulkan.

challenges.title: Challenge 3: Emergency changes right before release date
challenges.problem: Feedback on the UI required urgent changes under a tight schedule.
challenges.solution: Discussed with our partner to reduce unnecessary workload. Coordinatied the team to deliever the changes on time.

sections.title: What I Learned
items: Unity videoplayer is relying on WMF
More traditional way to install a game by utilizing Innosetup
Personnel changes can postpone the development timeline significantly
